properties.name: list
properties.description: The list that is gonna fire the event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: events
properties.description: The events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled

options.name: Campaign Sent
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a campaign is sent or cancelled

options.name: Cleaned
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's email address is cleaned from the list

options.name: Email Address Updated
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's email address is changed

options.name: Profile Updated
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's profile is updated

options.name: Subscribe
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a list subscriber is added

options.name: Unsubscribe
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a list member unsubscribes

properties.name: sources
properties.description: The possible sources of any events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled

options.name: User
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered by subscriber-initiated actions

options.name: Admin
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered by admin-initiated actions in the web interface

options.name: API
options.description: Whether the webhook is triggered by actions initiated via the API

possibleValues.name: Campaign Sent
possibleValues.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a campaign is sent or cancelled

possibleValues.name: Cleaned
possibleValues.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's email address is cleaned from the list

possibleValues.name: Email Address Updated
possibleValues.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's email address is changed

possibleValues.name: Profile Updated
possibleValues.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's profile is updated

possibleValues.name: Subscribe
possibleValues.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a list subscriber is added

possibleValues.name: Unsubscribe
possibleValues.description: Whether the webhook is triggered when a list member unsubscribes

possibleValues.name: User
possibleValues.description: Whether the webhook is triggered by subscriber-initiated actions

possibleValues.name: Admin
possibleValues.description: Whether the webhook is triggered by admin-initiated actions in the web interface

possibleValues.name: API
possibleValues.description: Whether the webhook is triggered by actions initiated via the API

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

settings.note: Trigger nodes only have common settings (notes, notesInFlow)
